official-title.#text: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for audits of the Internal Revenue Service to ensure that employees and service contractors of the Internal Revenue Service file their Federal tax returns on time and pay Federal tax debts owed.

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the
The Internal Revenue Manual requires all Internal Revenue Service employees, and contract employees, to file their Federal tax returns on time and pay any Federal tax debt.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Treasury Inspector General for Tax Administration

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: had $5.4 million in Federal tax debt.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Treasury Inspector General for Tax Administration

text.#text: Of the 691 contractor employees, 352 were not currently on a payment plan to resolve their tax debt.
